name: Titanium.UI.Color
summary: Represents a color used for UI components.

methods.name: toHex
methods.summary: Returns a hex string representation of the color
methods.description: The returned value is an uppercase hex representation of the color with a leading '#'. If fully opaque, the alpha hex values will be omitted. For example, black would return '#000000'. Black with a 50% opacity would return '#00000080'
